name: Cube Rule - Split Second Cubic Match Test
name_original: Cube Rule - Split Second Cubic Match Test
description:
TEST YOUR MIND NOW! Let’s see you deliver split second, high velocity moves. Are your eyes and hands on the same team? Want extreme challenge? Move smart, move fast! Do it now!

ONLY ONE RULE! Tap the correct side of the screen to push the cube to the matching colour portal. High speed play gives you a faster, more challenging game, including multiple mind blowing colors that match the intensity of your game play. Your brain will sizzle under the pressure.

Cube Rule is compatible with iOS9 and supports Apple ReplayKit allowing you to record and post all your Victories.
